description:
The Kamohara family dog, Jon. He came with a great pedigree but, because Mom`s motto is "Dogs belong outside," he has endured a tough life. Today will we find out what Jon`s true motives are?! Dad returns from overseas with soccer fever. He monopolizes the TV and tries to force everyone to watch a soccer match. Dad is acting exceptionally strange today, because tomorrow is Father`s Day. He is trying to be the model father because his kids are to be writing him "Thank you, Dad" cards. It is pouring outside. Unable to study, the family reminisces of their younger days while the rain pours outside.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Breakfast / Soccer / Father`s Day... What Happened? / Rainy Days
朝ごはん / サッカーさま / 父の日..., って? / 雨の日
